alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:51PM EDT until July 13 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN ST. LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hogansburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported a funnel cloud not reaching the ground with this storm at 212 PM. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Fort Covington, Bombay, Helena, St. Regis, Malone, Constable, Westville Center, Ironton, Fort Covington Center, Rooseveltown, South Bombay, and Hogansburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
